official_title: A bill to expedite certain California land exchanges between the Secretary of the Interior and the Nature Conservancy.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to proceed with land exchanges between the Nature Conservancy and the Bureau of Land Management to complete the Coachella Valley preserve, California.

titles.title: A bill to expedite certain California land exchanges between the Secretary of the Interior and the Nature Conservancy.
